nodes.text: Star Wars Widevision: The Original Topps Trading Card Series, Volume One

Star Wars Widevision: The Original Topps Trading Card Series, Volume One is a hardcover compilation book collecting the artwork from Topps' classic 1995 Topps Star Wars Widevision and 1997 Topps Star Wars Trilogy: The Complete Story trading card sets. It was written by Gary Gerani and published by Abrams ComicArts on April 18, 2017.
